name: Light Domain
description: Clerics of the Light domain are enlightened souls infused with radiance.

1.name: Bonus Cantrip
1.description: You learn the light cantrip if you don't already know it.

1.name: Warding Flare
1.description: When a creature you can see attacks you, use your reaction to impose disadvantage on the attack. Uses equal to your Wisdom modifier per long rest.

2.name: Channel Divinity: Radiance of the Dawn
2.description: Use Channel Divinity to dispel magical darkness and deal radiant damage to hostile creatures within 30 feet.

6.name: Improved Flare
6.description: You can use Warding Flare when a creature you can see attacks a creature other than you within 30 feet.

8.name: Potent Spellcasting
8.description: Add your Wisdom modifier to the damage you deal with cleric cantrips.

17.name: Corona of Light
17.description: As an action, emit bright light in a 60-foot radius for 1 minute. Enemies in the light have disadvantage on saving throws against fire or radiant spells.
